episodes.title: To Guru or Not to Guru: Essential Guidance or Misplaced Trust?
episodes.description: Whether you've ever felt torn between different yoga styles or pondered the hierarchical dynamics of spiritual mentorship, this episode offers fresh perspectives on the role of a guru in contemporary yoga practice. The hosts tackle challenging questions about cult-like behaviors in yoga communities, the ethical pitfalls of blind allegiance, and the potential financial motivations of modern-day gurus. More importantly, they discuss the empowering concept of the inner guru, advocating for a yoga practice that emphasizes self-awareness and internal guidance over external authority. So, do you need a guru? And is there a difference between a teacher and a guru? Tune in to find out. We're eager to hear your thoughts too—have you ever encountered a guru, and what was that experience like? Stick around, share your stories, and let's explore these questions together here on 'Black on the Mat'.
